user_flow.title: User Authentication
user_flow.description: Users can log in with username and password, create new accounts, and log out of their sessions through the authentication system.
user_flow.discovery_context: Login/Profile link is visible in the top navigation bar of the main page.

steps.action: Clicking on the Login/Profile link in the top right corner
steps.goal: Access the authentication system to test login functionality
steps.result: Successfully navigated to the login page
steps.memory: The QuickPizza app has a Login/Profile link in the top right corner of the homepage

steps.action: Clicking on the username input field
steps.goal: Focus on the username field to enter the default username
steps.result: Successfully focused on the username field
steps.memory: The login page shows hints for default credentials - username: 'default' and password: '12345678'

steps.action: Typing 'default' in the username field
steps.goal: Enter the default username as suggested by the hint
steps.result: Successfully entered 'default' in the username field

steps.action: Clicking on the password input field
steps.goal: Focus on the password field to enter the default password
steps.result: Successfully focused on the password field

steps.action: Typing the password '12345678' in the password field
steps.goal: Enter the default password as suggested by the hint
steps.result: Successfully entered the password in the password field

steps.action: Clicking on the Sign in button to authenticate
steps.goal: Complete the login process with the entered credentials
steps.result: Successfully logged in and accessed the user profile page

steps.action: Clicking on the Logout button to test the logout functionality
steps.goal: Test the logout functionality to complete the authentication system test
steps.result: Successfully tested logout functionality - user was redirected back to login page
steps.memory: After successful login, users are redirected to a profile page showing their pizza ratings with options to clear ratings and logout

summary: User authentication system successfully tested. Login with default credentials works, user profile displays correctly showing pizza ratings, and logout functionality redirects back to login page.

user_flow.title: Pizza Discovery
user_flow.description: Users can discover new pizza combinations through an interactive recommendation system with customizable parameters including calorie limits, topping counts, dietary restrictions, excluded tools, and custom naming options.
user_flow.discovery_context: Main page features a 'Pizza, Please!' button that promises to discover new pizza combinations with one click.

steps.action: Clicking on the "Pizza, Please!" button to access the pizza discovery system
steps.goal: Test the interactive pizza recommendation system to discover new pizza combinations
steps.result: Successfully generated first pizza recommendation - 'A Lazy Hawaii' with thin dough and detailed ingredients
steps.memory: The main page has a prominent "Pizza, Please!" button that appears to be the entry point for the pizza discovery feature

steps.action: Clicking the "Pizza, Please!" button again to test if it generates a different pizza recommendation
steps.goal: Verify that the system can generate multiple different pizza combinations
steps.result: Successfully generated a second different pizza recommendation - 'The Red Hawaii' with different ingredients and tools
steps.memory: The pizza discovery system successfully generates detailed pizza recommendations with name, dough type, ingredients, and tools when the button is clicked

steps.action: Scrolling down to look for feedback options for the pizza recommendation
steps.goal: Find and test feedback functionality for pizza recommendations
steps.result: Successfully found feedback options below the pizza recommendation
steps.memory: The system generates different pizza recommendations each time the button is clicked, with varying ingredients, tools, and additional details like calories

steps.action: Clicking the "Love it!" button to provide positive feedback on the pizza recommendation
steps.goal: Test the positive feedback functionality for pizza recommendations
steps.result: Successfully tested positive feedback - system requires login for feedback functionality
steps.memory: The pizza discovery system includes feedback buttons - 'No thanks' and 'Love it!' - allowing users to rate the recommendations

steps.action: Clicking the "No thanks" button to test negative feedback functionality
steps.goal: Test the negative feedback functionality to see if it also requires login
steps.result: Successfully tested negative feedback - system consistently requires login for all feedback functionality
steps.memory: The feedback system requires user authentication - clicking 'Love it!' shows 'Please log in first.' message

summary: Pizza Discovery user flow successfully tested. The system generates unique pizza recommendations with each click, includes comprehensive details (name, dough, ingredients, tools, calories), and provides feedback options that require authentication.

user_flow.title: Advanced Features Access
user_flow.description: Users can access advanced functionality through a dedicated interface.
user_flow.discovery_context: An 'Advanced' toggle or switch is visible in the top navigation area of the main page.

steps.action: Clicking on the "Advanced" link in the top right corner of the navigation bar
steps.goal: Access the advanced functionality interface to test the Advanced Features Access user flow
steps.result: Successfully accessed advanced functionality interface with various configuration options
steps.memory: The QuickPizza app has an "Advanced" link in the top navigation bar that provides access to advanced functionality

steps.action: Clicking on the "Must be vegetarian" checkbox to test the dietary preference feature
steps.goal: Test the vegetarian option in the advanced features to see if it affects pizza recommendations
steps.result: Successfully enabled the vegetarian checkbox option
steps.memory: The Advanced features interface includes configuration options for calories, toppings, excluded tools, vegetarian preference, and custom pizza naming

steps.action: Clicking on the Custom Pizza Name input field to test the custom naming feature
steps.goal: Test the custom pizza name functionality by entering a custom name
steps.result: Successfully focused on the custom pizza name input field

steps.action: Typing a custom pizza name in the input field
steps.goal: Test the custom pizza name functionality by entering a personalized name
steps.result: Successfully entered a custom pizza name

steps.action: Clicking the "Pizza, Please!" button to test if advanced configurations are applied to pizza generation
steps.goal: Test if the advanced features (vegetarian preference, custom name, and other configurations) are properly applied when generating a pizza
steps.result: Successfully generated a pizza recommendation with advanced features enabled

steps.action: Scrolling down to see the complete pizza recommendation and verify advanced settings are applied
steps.goal: View the complete pizza recommendation to confirm that advanced features like vegetarian preference and custom name are properly applied
steps.result: Successfully generated a pizza recommendation with advanced features applied, including vegetarian preference, calorie limits, and toppings constraints

summary: Advanced Features Access user flow successfully tested. The advanced interface provides comprehensive configuration options including calorie limits, toppings count, excluded tools, vegetarian preferences, and custom naming. All features are functional and properly applied to pizza generation.

user_flow.title: Admin Management
user_flow.description: Administrators can access a dedicated admin interface for system management through a dedicated login page with username and password authentication.
user_flow.discovery_context: Footer section contains a reference to an admin page with a clickable link.

steps.action: Clicking on the "Click here" link in the footer that mentions admin page access
steps.goal: Access the admin interface to test admin management functionality
steps.result: Successfully accessed the admin login page
steps.memory: The admin page can be accessed through a "Click here" link in the footer that says "Looking for the admin page?"

steps.action: Clicking the "Sign in" button to authenticate as admin
steps.goal: Test admin authentication to access the admin management interface
steps.result: Successfully logged into the admin interface and can view the latest pizza recommendations
steps.memory: The admin login page shows hints for credentials - username: "admin" and password: "admin". The username field appears to be pre-filled.

steps.action: Clicking the "Refresh" button to test the admin dashboard refresh functionality
steps.goal: Test if the admin can refresh the latest pizza recommendations list
steps.result: Successfully tested the refresh functionality - the page refreshed and maintained the recommendations list
steps.memory: The admin dashboard shows a list of latest pizza recommendations with detailed information including pizza names, tools used, and ingredient counts. It includes refresh functionality.

steps.action: Clicking the "Logout" button to test the admin logout functionality
steps.goal: Test the admin logout functionality to ensure proper session management
steps.result: Successfully tested the admin logout functionality - user was redirected back to the admin login page
steps.memory: The admin dashboard refresh functionality works properly and maintains the recommendations list after refresh

summary: Admin Management user flow successfully tested. Admin can access dedicated interface through footer link, authenticate with admin credentials, view latest pizza recommendations with detailed information, refresh the dashboard, and logout properly with session termination.
